Last night, another large-scale, combined missile and drone attack was carried out on Ukraine. 
The following missiles were launched:
~26 Kh-101 cruise missiles launched from 5 Tu-95MS and 1 Tu-160 strategic bombers over the village of Uzmore, Saratov Oblast. 
~11 Kalibr cruise missiles launched from 2 Buyan-M corvettes off the coast of Myskhako, Krasnodar Krai, in the eastern Black Sea. 
2 Kinzhal hypersonic aeroballistic missiles launched from 2 MiG-31Ks over Rasskazovsky District, Tambov Oblast. 
Estimated interceptions:
~3 Kalibrs (27.3%)
~8 Kh-101s (25.6%)
0 Kinzhals
The strike mainly targeted Ukrainian oil and energy infrastructure, including:
The Halyczyna Oil Refinery in Drohobych, Lviv Oblast (49.34054, 23.48142), impacted by ~3 Kalibrs
An unknown target in Kolomyya, Ivano-Frankivsk Oblast, impacted by ~4 Kalibrs.
Unknown targets in Lviv City, impacted by 16 Kh-101s, 3 Kalibrs, and 2 Kinzhals. 
An unknown target in Ivano-Frankivsk City, impacted by ~2 Kh-101s.
Additional information on targets should be clarified in the coming hours.

Scenes from Lviv City which was hit by roughly 21 missiles, and dozens of Geran-2 drones, in one of the largest attacks on the city since the beginning of the war.
Multiple large fires are now burning.

Scenes from Lviv City which was hit by roughly 21 missiles, and dozens of Geran-2 drones, in one of the largest attacks on the city since the beginning of the war.
Multiple large fires are now burning.
A large Russian Geran-2 drone attack was carried out on Odesa Oblast last night. The main target was the village of Usatove, on the edge of Odesa City. Large fires are now burning there.
A large Russian Geran-2 drone attack was carried out on Odesa Oblast last night. The main target was the village of Usatove, on the edge of Odesa City. Large fires are now burning there.

Zaporizhzhia City came under a combined KAB glide-bomb and Geran-2 drone attack last night. At least 7 Gerans impacted multiple targets within the city limits, while at least 6 KABs impacted the southern suburbs/outskirts. Widespread power outages are still ongoing, including in areas not usually affected as much. 
Additionally, long-range Smerch/Tornado-S MLRS targeted the city of Vil'nyans'k, northeast of Zaporizhzha City.

Zaporizhzhia City came under a combined KAB glide-bomb and Geran-2 drone attack last night. At least 7 Gerans impacted multiple targets within the city limits, while at least 6 KABs impacted the southern suburbs/outskirts. Widespread power outages are still ongoing, including in areas not usually affected as much. 
Additionally, long-range Smerch/Tornado-S MLRS targeted the city of Vil'nyans'k, northeast of Zaporizhzha City.
Several Russian Geran-2 drones targeted the Mekhanizatoriv Industrial Hub in Chernihiv City. NASA FIRMS data, as well as footage, shows that a large fire is now burning there.
Several Russian Geran-2 drones targeted the Mekhanizatoriv Industrial Hub in Chernihiv City. NASA FIRMS data, as well as footage, shows that a large fire is now burning there.

Zaporizhzhia City came under a combined KAB glide-bomb and Geran-2 drone attack last night. At least 7 Gerans impacted multiple targets within the city limits, while at least 6 KABs impacted the southern suburbs/outskirts. Widespread power outages are still‚Ä¶
One of the targets for the Gerans in Zaporizhzhia was the Motor Sich Plant, as evidenced by NASA FIRMS data.
One of the targets for the Gerans in Zaporizhzhia was the Motor Sich Plant, as evidenced by NASA FIRMS data.

Footage showing one of two Russian Geran-2 drone strikes on a Ukrainian passenger train in Shostka, Sumy Oblast, from yesterday.
The locomotive hit is No. ChME3 1816, and interestingly that same exact train was seen in September of this year covered in anti-drone netting. Additionally, the cargo cars can be linked back to Chornomorsk, Odesa Oblast, and that exact type has been used for maritime military purposes.

Footage showing one of two Russian Geran-2 drone strikes on a Ukrainian passenger train in Shostka, Sumy Oblast, from yesterday.
The locomotive hit is No. ChME3 1816, and interestingly that same exact train was seen in September of this year covered in anti-drone netting. Additionally, the cargo cars can be linked back to Chornomorsk, Odesa Oblast, and that exact type has been used for maritime military purposes.

Russian forces have recaptured the village of Vilne, Dobropillya direction, Donetsk Oblast.
Pre-war population: ~71.
Total land area: ~0.39 km¬≤.

Russian Army Pushes Forward Between Seversk And Liman (Videos)
The Russian military continued to advance between Seversk and Liman in the Donetsk direction by October 4, despite facing resistance from Kiev forces.
Video footage confirmed that the Yug [South] Group of Forces has taken over Fedorivka, located to the south of Fedorivka, although the capture of the settlement is yet to be officially announced by the Russian Ministry of Defense. Russian troops are likely still working to fully secure their new positions there.
üëâ

Military Situation In Syria On October 4, 2025 (Map Update)

Disruption of Frontline Supplies: Russian Strikes on Ukraine's Key Infrastructure
On October 3‚Äì4, Russian forces struck energy facilities in Ukraine that support the operation of military-industrial complex enterprises and critical supply lines. Among the targets were energy facilities in the Sumy, Chernihiv, Kharkiv, and Dnipropetrovsk regions, as well as launch sites for long-range drones.
Former U.S. Air Force Vice Chief of Staff General Richard Newton announced an impending shift in Ukraine's approach to military operations ‚Äî from active defense to more decisive offensive actions. He emphasized that Ukraine should receive Tomahawk cruise missiles, which would enable it to strike Russian targets at distances of up to 800 miles. In his opinion, "This would allow the Ukrainian Armed Forces to strike Russian command posts, logistics centers, and oil infrastructure, which would change the nature of the war and give Kyiv a new strategic tool of influence." 
üëâ

Military Situation In Ukraine On October 4, 2025 (Maps Update)

Russian Troops Strangle Kiev Forces In Kupyansk (Videos)
The Russian military‚Äôs offensive in Kupyansk gained momentum on October 4, but Kiev is still attempting to hold onto the key city.
In a major push, the Zapad [West] Group of Forces broke through Ukrainian defenses between the eastern part of Kupyansk and its eastern outskirts. This successful push in addition to recent advances in the western part of the city left Kiev forces cornered in a narrow strip in the center, mainly along the Privokzalnaya street connected to the southern entrance of the city.
Intensive use of drones by Kiev forces has so far prevented the Russian military from completely besieging the remaining Ukrainian troops in Kupyansk. This will not go on for long, however.
üëâ

Syria‚Äôs Former Army Resurfaces Under New Banner In North As Major Battle Brews (Videos)
The Kurdish-led Syrian Democratic Forces (SDF) has amassed a large force, reportedly including soldiers and officers from the former Syrian military, in the town of Deir Hafer, located just 40 kilometers to the east of Aleppo city in northern Syria, amid growing tensions with the country‚Äôs Islamist-led Interim Government.
In March, the Interim Government and the SDF signed a breakthrough agreement meant to integrate the group into the institutions of the new state.
The agreement, which was meant to de-escalate, ended up causing more tensions between the two sides. Despite talks in France, none of its terms have been implemented yet.
Read more 
HERE
